resources.string: Welcome to the Vestige tutorial. Let\'s learn the basics.
Tap anywhere on the screen to move to that location.
Tap the screen to move to that location
Good job! Move to the blue portal to begin the next lesson.
Your character will walk around obstacles, such as these purple walls. Enter the portal to complete this lesson.
Let\'s fire some projectiles. Slide your finger across the screen a short distance to shoot a projectile with a Swipe ability.
Touch, drag across the screen, and release
Now for a bigger projectile. To fire a Charge Swipe ability, swipe again but hold your finger down a little while before releasing.
Touch, drag, hold a bit, release
Next up: Double Tap ability. Quickly tap the same spot on the screen twice to teleport there.
For future reference, this Double Tap ability would strike a nearby enemy (if one was close enough).
Quickly tap the same screen location twice
Let\'s try a "Multi-Tap". Tap the screen with two fingers at the same time to shield yourself.
Using two fingers, tap the screen in two places at once
Let\'s try some combat. Keep in mind that your abilities need time to recharge after each use.
Swipe can be fired often but other abilities have longer cooldowns (displayed in the top left).
Use your abilities to defeat the enemy
Congratulations! You have completed the Vestige tutorial. Feel free to practice against the enemy or move to the portal to exit.
Move to the portal to finish the tutorial

Redirect pew balls by hitting them with your abilities. Earn a point each time a pew ball gets past your opponents but they earn a point whenever one gets past you. First team to the posted score wins but you must win by 2.
Your current Pew Ball progress will be lost. Are you sure you wish to start over from level 1?
Leaving now will cause you to concede this match and you will need to complete the previous three levels before you can attempt this one again. Are you sure you wish to leave?
Conceding this match means you will need to complete the previous three levels before you can attempt this one again. Are you sure you wish to concede?
